LanguageData.AF_TH_Pain.stages.0.label: It's a little sore
LanguageData.AF_TH_Pain.stages.0.description: Ow! aah... I can't work with these wounds. They'll get inflamed...
LanguageData.AF_TH_Pain.stages.1.label: It hurts like hell!
LanguageData.AF_TH_Pain.stages.1.description: Owwwwwwwwwwwwww! ! I think my foot's broken! ! !
LanguageData.AF_TH_Pain.stages.2.label: UNBEARABLE PAIN!
LanguageData.AF_TH_Pain.stages.2.description: My stomach was churning. I could see my own blood oozing out of the wound! \n\nLet's just get this over with!
LanguageData.AF_TH_Pain.stages.3.label: 【<color=#fbef97>No fear of death</color>】
LanguageData.AF_TH_Pain.stages.3.description: Ah Ha ha... I don't feel any pain now... \n\nI can feel my life coming to an end, but rest assured, I'll be waiting on the ship.
